description:
The Power Stretch Pro Bib is a light-weight fleeced bib, in a Polartec® Power Stretch Pro® fabric, designed for layering use in cold conditions.

The Power Stretch Pro® fabric is highly wind and abrasion-resistant and four-way stretch allows for excellent levels of freedom of movement. Key features include a two-way YKK front zip, flatlock low-bulk seams and a YKK zipped rainbow seat.

A slim fit ensures comfortable layering use.
name: Rab Power Stretch Pro Bib, Reg - Mens
